GroundView - Class in BoulderDash.views
FieldView FieldView, created by controller; we notice that we don't need to make levelModel observable; Because of the sprites we have to refresh the game windows very often so don't need of observers/observable mechanism This view is basically drawing into the Frame the levelModel.
